hero.title: A few days to relax.
hero.subtitle: A unique atmosphere blending tradition with modern comfort.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Csat√≥ Panzi√≥ welcomes guests in two villages of Transylvania. The guesthouse in Joseni delivers a boutique wellness experience for smaller groups, while the one in Borzont focuses on larger gatherings who want countryside calm with the same comfort and services.

joseni.title: Joseni ¬∑ retreat for 18 guests
joseni.body:
• 3 apartments for 4 people with private bathrooms and refrigerators
  • 2 rooms for 3 people, ideal for families
  • Hot tub, sauna, barbecue, shared kitchen, cozy lounge

borzont.title: Borzont ¬∑ 10 rooms for 30 people
borzont.body:
• 10 twin rooms with optional extra bed and private bathroom
  • Lounge areas, hot tub, sauna, BBQ and many more

testimonials.title: Reviews

whole.title: Entire property
whole.subtitle: for 18 adults
whole.description: 5 rooms, private bathrooms, refrigerators in each room, free wifi, access to the kitchen, slippers, free parking, hot tub, BBQ facilities, heating, 24/24 support.

room3.title: Room of 3 beds with private bathroom
room3.subtitle: for 3 adults
room3.count: There are 2 rooms in total like this.
room3.description: This type of room contains 1 bed for 1 adult, and a Queen bed for 2 adults, private bathroom, refrigerator, free wifi, access to the kitchen.

apartmentUp.title: Apartment for 4 adults with private bathroom
apartmentUp.subtitle: for 4 people
apartmentUp.count: There are 2 rooms in total like this.
apartmentUp.description: This type of room contains an extensible sofa for 2 adults and a Queen bed for 2 adults, private bathroom, refrigerator, free wifi, access to the kitchen.

apartmentDown.title: Apartment for 4 adults with private bathroom
apartmentDown.subtitle: for 4 people
apartmentDown.count: There is 1 room in total like this.
apartmentDown.description: This type of room contains an extensible sofa for 2 adults and a Queen bed for 2 adults, private bathroom, refrigerator, free wifi, access to the kitchen.

whole.title: Entire property
whole.subtitle: Up to 30 guests
whole.description: Ten double rooms that can accommodate a third guest on request, offering space for up to 30 people. Lounge areas, hot tub, sauna, BBQ, Wi-Fi, parking, and round-the-clock support.

rooms.title: Rooms for 2-3 guests
rooms.subtitle: Balcony on request
rooms.count: 10 similar rooms available across the property.
rooms.description: Bright rooms furnished with twin beds that can be combined and an extra bed for a third guest. Every room includes a private bathroom, Wi-Fi, fridge, heating, and full access to all facilities (except for the kitchen).

privacy.contentHtml:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 15/12/2024

This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website. By using this website, you agree to the terms of this policy.

1. Information We Collect

We collect information to improve your experience on our website. The information we collect includes:

  • Personal Information: When you contact us via forms, we may collect your name, email address, and other information you provide voluntarily.
  • Usage Data: We automatically collect non-personal information about your interactions with our website, such as:
    • Pages visited
    • Time spent on the website
    • IP address
    • Browser type and version
    • Operating system

2. Use of Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience. We use cookies for the following purposes:

  • Necessary Cookies: These cookies are required for the website to function properly.
  • Analytics Cookies: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our website and improve our services.

For more information on how Google collects and processes data, visit: Google's Privacy & Terms

3. Managing Cookies

You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of this website.

If you wish to opt out of Google Analytics tracking, you can use the following tools: Google Analytics Opt-Out Browser Add-on

4. How We Use Your Information

The information we collect is used for:

  • Improving website functionality and user experience
  • Understanding website performance and visitor behavior
  • Responding to your inquiries or requests

We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

5. Data Retention

We retain your data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Usage data collected via Google Analytics is retained according to Google‚Äôs data retention policies.

6. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights under applicable privacy laws:

  • The right to access your data
  • The right to request correction or deletion of your data
  • The right to withdraw consent for data processing
  • The right to file a complaint with a data protection authority

To exercise your rights, contact us at: csatopanzio@gmail.com

7. Third-Party Services

We use third-party services like Google Analytics to improve our website. These services may collect, store, and process data independently. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies for more information:

  • Google's Privacy Policy

8. Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed as completely secure.

9. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: csatopanzio@gmail.com

Address: Str. Gheorgheni, nr. 5, Joseni, Harghita, Rom√¢nia
